name: FootBallGo
description: "FootBallGo — Gamefi x NFT x Metaverse x Binance Smart Chain FootBallGo is a different Game — Financial ecosystem built on blockchain technology. We offer our users the opportunity to earn from Play-to-Earn mechanism through a football-themed video game. FootBallGo revolves around the plot of a virtual planet — FootBallMetaverse. FootBallGo owns outstanding features, creating a comprehensive ecosystem to help holder optimize their investment. - Digital real estate ownership - Play to Earn (PvE, PvP) - NFT Market - NFT Farming This is one special thing only at FootBallGo — the first fully decentralized game with a football theme that allows you to decide and vote on how the football world works."
